name: CCNet Services
tag_list: managed-hosting, dedicated-servers, vps, esx-hosting, tier-4, datacenter, sas70
overview:
CCNet is a leader in Managed Hosting Solutions and Managed Hosting Services with an IT global reach that spans The United States, Canada, South America, Asia and the EU.

CCNet Managed Services, LLC is headquartered in New Jersey and offers Managed Hosting solutions and services to medium and large clients as well as Dedicated Server Hosting to clients looking for cost efficient solutions.

CCNET management team is comprised of accomplished IT professionals with decades vested in the managed hosting segment. With a global presence and a leader in hosting services, CCNET offers core data center n + 1 redundant systems and strategic benefits with core full redundancy and zero fault tolerance systems and platforms.

Switch and transfer your IT applications today and enjoy lower TCO, higher ROI, greater redundancy, faster servers and response time, higher bandwidth speeds and IT Resiliency and Sustainability.
